subject: Horse Racing
Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: In 25 years as a horse trainer, Chip Woolley has done a lot of hard work and seen his share of tough times. But now his horse, Mine That Bird, is a 2-1 favorite to win the Belmont Stakes.
snippet: In 25 years as a horse trainer, Chip Woolley has done a lot of hard work and seen his share of tough times. But now his horse, Mine That Bird, is a 2-1 favorite to win the Belmont Stakes.
